h2301.definition: from {{h2300}}; fierce; Chadad, an Ishmaelite; Hadad.

h2302.definition: a primitive root; to rejoice; make glad, be joined, rejoice.

h2307.definition: from {{h2300}}; a peak; Chadid, a place in Palestine; Hadid.

h2308.definition: a primitive root; properly, to be flabby, i.e. (by implication) desist; (figuratively) be lacking or idle; cease, end, fall, forbear, forsake, leave (off), let alone, rest, be unoccupied, want.

h2309.definition: from {{h2308}}; rest, i.e. the state of the dead; world.

h2310.definition: from {{h2308}}; vacant, i.e. ceasing or destitute; he that forbeareth, frail, rejected.

h2311.definition: from {{h2309}}; idle; Chadlai, an Israelite; Hadlai.

h2312.definition: from an unused root meaning to sting; a prickly plant; brier, thorn.

h2313.definition: probably of foreign origin; the Chiddekel (or Tigris) river; Hiddekel.

h2314.definition: a primitive root; properly, to inclose (as a room), i.e. (by analogy,) to beset (as in a siege); enter a privy chamber.

h2315.definition: from {{h2314}}; an apartment (usually literal); ((bed) inner) chamber, innermost(-ward) part, parlour,   south, × within.

h2316.definition: another form for {{h2315}}; chamber; Chadar, an Ishmaelite; Hadar.

h2317.definition: of uncertain derivation; Chadrak, a Syrian deity; Hadrach.

h2318.definition: a primitive root; to be new; causatively, to rebuild; renew, repair.

h2320.definition: from {{h2318}}; the new moon; by implication, a month; month(-ly), new moon.

h2321.definition: the same as {{h2320}}; Chodesh, an Israelitess; Hodesh.

h2322.definition: feminine of {{h2319}}; new; Chadashah, a place in Palestine; Hadashah.

h2325.definition: also חָיַב; a primitive root; properly, perhaps to tie, i.e. (figuratively and reflexively) to owe, or (by implication) to forfeit; make endanger.

h2327.definition: feminine active participle of {{h2247}}; hiding place; Chobah, a place in Syria; Hobah.

h2328.definition: a primitive root (compare {{h2287}}); to describe a circle; compass.

h2329.definition: from {{h2328}}; a circle; circle, circuit, compass.

h2330.definition: a primitive root; properly, to tie a knot, i.e. (figuratively) to propound a riddle; put forth.

h2331.definition: a primitive root; (compare {{h2324}}, {{h2421}}); properly, to live; by implication (intensively) to declare or show; show.

h2332.definition: causatively from {{h2331}}; life-giver; Chavvah (or Eve), the first woman; Eve.

h2333.definition: properly, the same as {{h2332}} (life-giving, i.e. living-place); by implication, an encampment or village; (small) town.

h2334.definition: from the plural of {{h2333}} and a modification of {{h3265}}; hamlets of Jair, a region of Palestine; (Bashan-) Havoth-jair.

h2335.definition: from {{h2374}}; visionary; Chozai, an Israelite; the seers.

h2336.definition: from an unused root apparently meaning to pierce; a thorn; by analogy, a ring for the nose; bramble, thistle, thorn.

h2337.definition: perhaps the same as {{h2336}}; a dell or crevice (as if pierced in the earth); thicket.

h2338.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to the root of {{h2339}}, perhaps as a denominative; to string together, i.e. (figuratively) to repair; join.

h2339.definition: from an unused root probably meaning to sew; a string; by implication, a measuring tape; cord, fillet, line, thread.

h2340.definition: perhaps from {{h2333}}; a villager; a Chivvite, one of the aboriginal tribes of Palestine; Hivite.

h2341.definition: probably from {{h2342}}; circular; Chavilah, the name of two or three eastern regions; also perhaps of two men; Havilah.

h2342.definition: or חִיל; a primitive root; properly, to twist or whirl (in a circular or spiral manner), i.e. (specifically) to dance, to writhe in pain (especially of parturition) or fear; figuratively, to wait, to pervert; bear, (make to) bring forth, (make to) calve, dance, drive away, fall grievously (with pain), fear, form, great, grieve, (be) grievous, hope, look, make, be in pain, be much (sore) pained, rest, shake, shapen, (be) sorrow(-ful), stay, tarry, travail (with pain), tremble, trust, wait carefully (patiently), be wounded.

h2343.definition: from {{h2342}}; a circle; Chul, a son of Aram; also the region settled by him; Hul.

h2344.definition: from {{h2342}}; sand (as round or whirling particles); sand.

h2345.definition: from an unused root meaning to be warm, i.e. (by implication); sunburnt or swarthy (blackish); brown.

h2346.definition: feminine active participle of an unused root apparently meaning to join; a wall of protection; wall, walled.

h2347.definition: a primitive root; properly, to cover, i.e. (figuratively) to compassionate; pity, regard, spare.

h2348.definition: from an unused root meaning to cover; a cove (as a sheltered bay); coast (of the sea), haven, shore, (sea-) side.

h2349.definition: from the same as {{h2348}}; protection; Chupham, an Israelite; Hupham.

h2350.definition: patronymically from {{h2349}}; a Chuphamite or descendant of Chupham; Huphamites.

h2351.definition: or (shortened) חֻץ; (both forms feminine in the plural) from an unused root meaning to sever; properly, separate by a wall, i.e. outside, outdoors; abroad, field, forth, highway, more, out(-side, -ward), street, without.

h2352.definition: or (shortened) חֻר; from an unused root probably meaning to bore; the crevice of a serpent; the cell of a prison; hole.

h2354.definition: the same as {{h2353}} or {{h2352}}; Chur, the name of four Israelites and one Midianite; Hur.

h2355.definition: the same as {{h2353}}; white linen; network. Compare {{h2715}}.

h2356.definition: or (shortened) חֹר; the same as {{h2352}}; a cavity, socket, den; cave, hole.

h2357.definition: a primitive root; to blanch (as with shame); wax pale.

h2358.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h2357}}; white; white.

h2359.definition: probably from {{h2353}}; linen-worker; Churi, an Israelite; Huri.

h2360.definition: probably an orthographical variation for {{h2359}}; Churai, an Israelite; Hurai.

h2361.definition: probably from {{h2353}}; whiteness, i.e. noble; Churam, the name of an Israelite and two Syrians; Huram. Compare {{h2438}}.

h2362.definition: apparently from {{h2357}} (in the sense of {{h2352}}); cavernous; Chavran, a region East of the Jordan; Hauran.

h2363.definition: a primitive root; to hurry; figuratively, to be eager with excitement or enjoyment; (make) haste(-n), ready.

h2364.definition: from {{h2363}}; haste; Chushah, an Israelite; Hushah.

h2365.definition: from {{h2363}}; hasty; Chushai, an Israelite; Hushai.

h2366.definition: or חֻשִׁים; or חֻשִׁם; plural from {{h2363}}; hasters; Chushim, the name of three Israelites; Hushim.

h2367.definition: or חֻשָׁם; from {{h2363}}; hastily; Chusham, an Idumaean; Husham.

h2368.definition: or חֹתָם; from {{h2856}}; a signature-ring; seal, signet.

h2369.definition: the same as {{h2368}}; seal; Chotham, the name of two Israelites; Hotham, Hothan.

h2370.definition: (Aramaic) or חֲזָה; (Aramaic), corresponding to {{h2372}}; to gaze upon; mentally to dream, be usual (i.e. seem); behold, have (a dream), see, be wont.

h2371.definition: or חֲזָהאֵל; from {{h2372}} and {{h410}}; God has seen; Chazael, a king of Syria; Hazael.

h2372.definition: a primitive root; to gaze at; mentally to perceive, contemplate (with pleasure); specifically, to have a vision of; behold, look, prophesy, provide, see.

h2373.definition: from {{h2372}}; the breast (as most seen in front); breast.

h2374.definition: active participle of {{h2372}}; a beholder in vision; also a compact (as looked upon with approval); agreement, prophet, see that, seer, (star-) gazer.

h2375.definition: from {{h2372}}; seer; Chazo, a nephew of Abraham; Hazo.

h2377.definition: from {{h2372}}; a sight (mentally), i.e. a dream, revelation, or oracle; vision.

h2380.definition: from {{h2372}}; a look; hence (figuratively) striking appearance, revelation, or (by implication) compact; agreement, notable (one), vision.

h2381.definition: from {{h2372}} and {{h410}}; seen of God; Chaziel, a Levite; Haziel.

h2382.definition: from {{h2372}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has seen; Chazajah, an Israelite; Hazaiah.

h2383.definition: from {{h2372}}; vision; Chezjon, a Syrian; Hezion.

h2384.definition: from {{h2372}}; a revelation, expectation by dream; vision.

h2385.definition: from an unused root meaning to glare; a flash of lightning; bright cloud, lightning.

h2386.definition: from an unused root probably meaning to inclose; a hog (perhaps as penned); boar, swine.

h2387.definition: from the same as {{h2386}}; perhaps protected; Chezir, the name of two Israelites; Hezir.

h2388.definition: a primitive root; to fasten upon; hence, to seize, be strong (figuratively, courageous, causatively strengthen, cure, help, repair, fortify), obstinate; to bind, restrain, conquer; aid, amend, × calker, catch, cleave, confirm, be constant, constrain, continue, be of good (take) courage(-ous, -ly), encourage (self), be established, fasten, force, fortify, make hard, harden, help, (lay) hold (fast), lean, maintain, play the man, mend, become (wax) mighty, prevail, be recovered, repair, retain, seize, be (wax) sore, strengthen (self), be stout, be (make, shew, wax) strong(-er), be sure, take (hold), be urgent, behave self valiantly, withstand.

h2389.definition: from {{h2388}}; strong (usu. in a bad sense, hard, bold, violent); harder, hottest,   impudent, loud, mighty, sore, stiff(-hearted), strong(-er).

h2393.definition: feminine of {{h2391}}; prevailing power; strength(-en self), (was) strong.

h2394.definition: feminine of {{h2392}}; vehemence (usually in a bad sense); force, mightily, repair, sharply.

h2395.definition: from {{h2388}}; strong; Chizki, an Israelite; Hezeki.

h2396.definition: or חִזְקִיָּהוּ; also יְחִזְקִיָּה; or יְחִזְקִיָּהוּ; from {{h2388}} and {{h3050}}; strengthened of Jah; Chizkijah, a king of Judah, also the name of two other Israelites; Hezekiah, Hizkiah, Hizkijah. Compare {{h3169}}.

h2397.definition: once (Ezekiel 29:4) חָחִי; from the same as {{h2336}}; a ring for the nose (or lips); bracelet, chain, hook.

h2398.definition: a primitive root; properly, to miss; hence (figuratively and generally) to sin; by inference, to forfeit, lack, expiate, repent, (causatively) lead astray, condemn; bear the blame, cleanse, commit (sin), by fault, harm he hath done, loss, miss, (make) offend(-er), offer for sin, purge, purify (self), make reconciliation, (cause, make) sin(-ful, -ness), trespass.

h2399.definition: from {{h2398}}; a crime or its penalty; fault, × grievously, offence, (punishment of) sin.

h2400.definition: intensively from {{h2398}}; a criminal, or one accounted guilty; offender, sinful, sinner.
